name: Orcs Rescue!
description:
Game made for the Unidos Jam 2022

Desciption

You are a hero in a mission to rescue a group of kidnapped good orcs taken away to a dungeon full of deadly traps.

Will you survive the traps and rescue the orcs or will you succumb and die trying?

Quick Hero, make haste!

Contributors

Emilio Perez: https://emiperez3.itch.io

Lucas Farias: https://lucasfdev.itch.io
